To characterize Darwin's comments to Lyell and Hooker as
angst-riddenis too kind. Darwin's tone sounded as if his whole life
had been turned upside down by Wallace's essay. Why was Darwin
so disturbed? The answer reveals something of Darwin's character-
it is not possible to be definitive because Darwin was so emotional.

Victorian and Twentieth-Century Literature Given the myriad changes

binding premise of this diverse collection is not surprisingly change

The history of Roman London is meagre. Seventeen years after the
building of the Citadel, on the rebellion of Boadicea, the Roman
general Suetonius abandoned the place, as unable to defend it. All
those who remained were massacred by the insurgents. After this, 
so far as we know, for history is silent, there was peace in London
for 200 years.

People with OCD feel compelled to do certain thing because their 
obsessive thoughts trigger intense anxiety. For example, someone
with OCD might feel a strong urge to check that they locked the 
door, over and over, because their fear of being robbed is 
overwhelming. Other times, people with OCD wash their hands
repetitively because they're terrfied about getting an infection.

closer to Baudelaire than to Carlyle in spirit. The chapters on

that one means an era governed by metropolitan sensibilities.
